cmu.ds.mr.test
Class Anagram.AnagramMapper

java.lang.Object
  cmu.ds.mr.mapred.MapReduceBase
      cmu.ds.mr.test.Anagram.AnagramMapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Mapper<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
Enclosing class:
Anagram
public static class Anagram.AnagramMapper
extends MapReduceBase
implements Mapper<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String>

The Anagram mapper class gets a word as a line from the HDFS input and sorts the letters in the word and writes its back to the output collector as Key : sorted word (letters in the word sorted) Value: the word itself as the value. When the reducer runs then we can group anagrams togather based on the sorted key.

Author:
subbu iyer
